concept.title: Release 11.6.3
concept.shortdesc: Release 11.6.3 includes the following new features.

li.b: Moderators can now mute dial-in users
li.p: If your organization has deployed the new TeamCall Meeting Gateway to facilitate dial-in users in your meetings, the 11.6.2 release together with the 11.6 IF1 meetings server will allow moderators to mute these dial-in participants. See more information about the TeamCall Meeting Gateway here.
Devices must be running Android OS 8.0 and above to use version 11.6.3.
